Milan : Italy

Milan is among the most world's fashion capitals and it is synonymous with the leading names in designer fashion which include Armani, Versace, Dolce & Gabbana and Gucci, all of whom arrange their original boutiques within this city.

She told me it was a replica designer because the girl couldn't possibly afford a real Louis Vuitton. On closer inspection I observed that signature "LV" was absent from what should have been the trademark habit. I told her it wasn't an original, but also not a replica designer.
